table_description: Race data for each Formula 1 race from 1950-2020, including positions, drivers, teams, and points.

table_columns.name: position
table_columns.description: The finishing position of the driver.

table_columns.name: name_tag
table_columns.description: Abbreviated tag of the driver's name.

table_columns.name: team
table_columns.description: The racing team of the driver.

table_columns.name: time
table_columns.description: Finishing time or gap to the leader.

table_rules: Position can contain values like 'R' for retired or 'D' for disqualified, not just numeric positions.
Time can be the actual race time for the winner, or the gap to the leader for other finishers.
Points systems have changed over the years, so direct points comparisons across eras may not be meaningful.
